Source: https://ratatui.rs/ecosystem/mousefood

# Embedded

## Mousefood

[Section titled “Mousefood”](#mousefood)

An [embedded-graphics](https://docs.rs/embedded-graphics) backend for Ratatui! Supports `no_std`.

- [Quickstart](https://github.com/ratatui/mousefood?tab=readme-ov-file#quickstart)

- [API Documentation](https://docs.rs/mousefood/)

- [Built with Mousefood](https://github.com/ratatui/mousefood?tab=readme-ov-file#built-with-mousefood)

Example Project

[Tuitar](https://github.com/orhun/tuitar) is a guitar learning tool &#x26; DIY kit built with Ratatui &#x26;
Mousefood.

Tip

Mousefood can also be used as a backend for any `embedded-graphics` draw target, which means you can
use it with a variety of displays and platforms.

For example:

[Ratatui running on PSP](https://github.com/overdrivenpotato/rust-psp/tree/master/examples/ratatui)
via `rust-psp`

 [Edit page](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui-website/edit/main/src/content/docs/ecosystem/mousefood.md)

 [Previous Effects and animations](/ecosystem/tachyonfx/) [Next Build websites](/ecosystem/ratzilla/)
